name.ja: <ruby>Ｓ<rt>シャイニング</rt></ruby><ruby>Ｎｏ．<rt>ナンバーズ</rt></ruby>３８ タイタニック・ギャラクシー

text.en:
3 Level 9 LIGHT monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using "Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Gains 200 ATK for each material attached to it. Once per turn: You can target up to 2 Spell/Traps your opponent controls; attach them this card as material. The targeted cards, and their effects, cannot be activated in response to this card's activation. You can detach 1 material from this card; for the rest of this turn, this card's original ATK becomes 1500, also it can attack directly.
